Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT DEAL
Reviews.Author: Curtis Miller
Reviews.Content: Love this camera and everything that came with it! Super fast shipping. Everything as described. Great value!!! Would have paid the same price in the store for just the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Zeikos BG-E8 Battery Grip +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E8 + <7> 58mm UV Filter +
<8> Additional 58mm UV Filter + <9> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <10> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <11> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm IS II & 55-250mm IS Lens with 32GB Card + Backpack + LED Flash + Grip + Battery Kit
